TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class EditorPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 用作位于 区域中的控件的基类，用于编辑 控件。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones and are used to edit controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类提供由 Web 部件控件集提供的派生控件和自定义控件使用的一组基本属性和方法。 The class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom controls. 控件允许用户通过修改关联控件的布局、外观、属性、行为或其他特征来对其进行编辑。 An control allows a user to edit an associated control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 由包含 控件的区域组成, 在网页进入编辑模式后显示。The editing user interface (UI), which consists of zones that contain controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 只能在派生自类的区域中使用控件 , 例如控件。An control can be used only within a zone that derives from the class, such as the control. 在页面进入编辑模式后, 用户可以通过单击所选控件的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词来选择要编辑的控件。After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control. 一次只能编辑一个控件。Only one control can be edited at a time. 以下表格中列出了若干派生控件, Web 部件控件集。Several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table. 这些控件提供大多数应用程序所需的所有编辑功能。These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications. 在 Web 部件页中使用这些控件的典型方法是在``元素内将它们声明为页持久性格式, 其中``是``元素的子元素。The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `` element, where `` is the child element of an `` element. 有关代码示例, 请参阅本主题的 "示例" 部分。For a code example, see the Example section of this topic. |控件类型Type of control|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||编辑关联控件的外观, 包括属性, 如其标题文本、高度、宽度和边框属性。Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| ||编辑关联控件的某些行为, 例如是否可对其进行编辑、是否可将其关闭, 或是否可将其移动到另一个区域。Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone. 仅当在共享个性化设置范围内编辑控件时, 此控件才会显示在页面上。This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| ||编辑关联控件的布局特性, 例如它是处于正常还是最小化 (折叠) 状态, 以及它所处的区域。Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| ||如果在源代码中使用`WebBrowsable`属性声明了这些属性, 则编辑关联控件的属性。Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性, Web 部件控件集中提供的所有控件都呈现在`
`元素中。To improve accessibility, all the controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `
` element. 元素对用于在给定控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组, 并为可视化用户代理 (如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理等控件中的选项卡式导航提供便利。 `
`(如屏幕阅读软件)。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式和编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of controls. 此代码示例包含四个部分:This code example has four parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个网页, 其中包含一个控件, 其中包含在区域中声明的 Web 部件控件集中的多个控件, 以及对自定义控件的引用。A Web page that contains an control, with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and a reference to a custom control. - 一个包含自定义控件的类, 以及一个用于在控件中编辑属性的自定义控件。A class that contains the custom control, and a custom control for editing a property in the control. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#14)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#14)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含对控件的声明性引用, 该子``元素包含对两个 Web 部件控件集控件的声明性引用。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to two of the Web Parts control set controls. 该页还引用自定义控件, 对``该程序`Register`集使用指令, 并使用控件的元素。The page also references a custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#12)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#12)] 此代码示例的第三部分是名为 `TextDisplayWebPart`的自定义类。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 类实现接口。The class implements the interface. 此类中包含一个嵌套的私有类, 其中包含 `TextDisplayWebPart`与类关联并名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`的私有类的代码。Within this class is a nested, private class that contains the code for a private class associated with the `TextDisplayWebPart` class and named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 在运行时, `TextDisplayWebPart`当控件进入编辑模式时, 它在其`TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts`方法中`TextDisplayEditorPart`创建类的一个实例, 并在控件中显示该实例以及其他控件。At run time, as the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode, in its `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` method, it creates an instance of the `TextDisplayEditorPart` class, and displays it in the control, along with the other controls. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面, 然后在 "**显示模式**" 控件上选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。Load the page in a browser, and on the **Display Mode** control, select **Edit Mode** to switch to edit mode. 单击`TextDisplayWebPart`控件标题栏中的谓词菜单 (向下箭头), 然后单击 "**编辑**" 以编辑控件。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后, 可以看到三个控件, 其中包括用于`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`编辑属性的自定义控件。When the editing UI is visible, you can see three controls, including the custom one that enables you to edit the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改, 并单击 "**应用**" 按钮, 则可以使用下拉列表控件将页面返回到浏览模式, 并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

para.span: 若要创建自定义控件, 必须重写两个重要的方法。

span.span: To create a custom control, you must override two important methods.

para.span: 方法将编辑器控件中所做的更改应用于要编辑的控件。

span.span: The method applies changes made in the editor control to the control being edited.

para.span: 方法获取正在编辑的控件的当前值, 以便编辑器控件可以对其进行编辑。

span.span: The method gets the current values of the control being edited, so that the editor control can edit them.

para.span: 使用这两个关键方法, 可以获取和设置自定义控件与其正在编辑的控件之间的值。

span.span: Using these two critical methods, you get and set values between your custom control and the control it is editing.

para.span: 如果从类派生以创建自定义编辑器控件, 则可以通过在控件、用户控件或服务器控件中实现接口, 将自定义控件添加到区域。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create custom editor controls, you can add your custom controls to an zone by implementing the interface in a control, a user control, or a server control.

para.span: 有关更多详细信息和代码示例, 请参阅类概述。

span.span: For more details and a code example, see the class overview.

para.span: 此外, "示例" 部分中的代码示例演示如何在自定义控件中实现。

span.span: Also, the code example in the Example section demonstrates how to implement in a custom control.
Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean

summary.span: 将 控件中的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values in an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法。 The method is a critical method on an control. 它在类中定义为抽象方法, 必须由继承的控件实现。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 此方法的目的是将用户在控件中输入的值保存到属性中引用的控件中的相应属性。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an control to the corresponding properties in the control that is referenced in the property. 当用户在编辑用户界面 (UI) 中单击表示 "确定" 或 "应用" 谓词的按钮时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义 控件中实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了名为 `TextDisplayEditorPart`的自定义类中方法的实现。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 此方法`TextDisplayWebPart` 使用属性获取对关联控件的引用。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 然后更新`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性的值。It then updates the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示关联`TextDisplayWebPart`控件如何创建关联控件的集合 (在这种情况下, 集合中只有一个名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`的控件)。方法的实现。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 当`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式时, 将执行此方法。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 从类派生的类必须实现方法。

span.span: A class that derives from the class must implement the method.

para.span: 实现的方法使用属性获取对关联控件的引用, 然后使用控件中的当前值更新该控件的属性。

span.span: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the property, and then updates the properties of that control with the current values in the control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编辑过程的某些位置, 包含控件的区域会检查属性, 以确定是否显示控件。At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an control checks the property to determine whether to display the control. 在两种情况下 , 属性将返回`false` , 且不显示控件。There are two scenarios where the property returns `false` and the control is not displayed. 第一种情况是在正在编辑的控件是控件时出现。The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a control. 第二种情况是在要编辑的控件的和属性设置为`true`的情况下发生, 而在用户级别设置页面的个性化设置范围。The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its and properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串包含 控件的标题栏中显示的标题文本。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an control.

value.span: 一个表示控件的完整可见标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是一个由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件没有标题, 则 属性返回基属性的当前值,或者为计算的值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 计算的值由无标题控件的可本地化资源字符串组成。The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls. 在没有为属性赋值的情况下, 属性的值与属性不同。In the cases where no value is assigned to the property, the value of the property differs from the property. 由于属性设计为只读, 计算属性以在运行时获取所显示标题的实际当前值, 因此不要尝试使用此属性来设置控件的标题。 Because the property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an control. 若要设置标题, 请使用基本属性。To set a title, use the base property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: Retrieves the current state of an control's parent zone.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中具有包含 控件的 区域的当前状态。

span.span: An that has the current state of the zone that contains an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回有关包含控件的区域的状态信息。 The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an control. 以字典形式返回状态信息。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了调用基方法, 该方法还会检查属性。In addition to calling the base method, the method also checks the property. 如果值为`false`, 表示不应显示控件, 则属性也设置为`false`。If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the property is also set to `false`.

exception.span: 包含 控件的 为 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SyncChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 从 控件检索其关联 控件的属性值。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control for its associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法。 The method is a critical method on an control. 它在类中定义为抽象方法, 必须由继承的控件实现。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 此方法的目的是检索 属性中引用的控件的当前值, 并使用这些值更新控件中的字段, 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the control referenced in the property, and update the fields in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 只要关联控件中的值发生更改, 就会调用方法。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于每个控件, 包含控件的区域在调用方法之后立即调用方法, 以便控件中的值始终与中的值同步关联的控件。For every control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 调用方法的另一种情况是在控件进入编辑模式时。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 如果方法 返回`false`, 则不会调用方法, 因为在这种情况下, 会发生错误。 The method is not called after the method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义 控件中实现方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了名为 `TextDisplayEditorPart`的自定义类中方法的实现。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 此方法`TextDisplayWebPart` 使用属性获取对关联控件的引用。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 然后, 该示例获取`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`属性的值, 并更新自定义控件上的下拉列表控件 ( `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle`由属性引用) 中选择的项。It then gets the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property, and updates which item is selected in the drop-down list control (referenced by the `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` property) on the custom control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示关联`TextDisplayWebPart`控件如何创建关联控件的集合 (在这种情况下, 集合中只有一个名为`TextDisplayEditorPart`的控件)。方法的实现。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 当`TextDisplayWebPart`控件进入编辑模式时, 将执行此方法。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 从类派生的类必须实现方法。

span.span: A class that derives from the class must implement the method.

para.span: 实现的方法使用属性获取对关联控件的引用, 然后使用关联控件的属性值更新控件。

span.span: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the property, and then updates the control with the property values from the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对与当前网页关联的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control associated with the current Web page.
A reference to the on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件需要对实例的引用, 因为它必须检查页面的当前个性化设置范围才能确定属性的值。 An control needs a reference to the instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the property. 通过检查可通过属性访问的属性来确定个性化设置范围。Personalization scope is determined by checking the property, which is accessed through the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对当前正在编辑的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.

value.span: 当前处于编辑模式中的 。

span.span: A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前正在编辑的控件 (或其他服务器或用户控件) 对应于属性的值。The control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the property. 一次只能编辑一个控件, 当控件处于编辑模式时 , 属性提供对该控件的引用。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 在区域将控件添加到控件集合后, 它会将其自己的属性值分配给控件的属性。 After the zone has added the control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own property to the property on the control. 控件使用属性, 尤其是在其两个关键方法中 - -和--用于获取和设置关联控件上的属性值。 An control uses the property especially in its two critical methods-- and --to get and set the property values on the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As EditorZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对包含 控件的 区域的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the zone that contains an control.
An that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然属性是只读的, 但它提供对包含控件的区域对象的引用, 你可以通过编程方式更改区域本身的属性值。Although the property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
